Class HighscoreService

java.lang.Object
ch.quizinno.brainquest.services.HighscoreService
@Service public class HighscoreService extends Object
Service for managing highscores.

      public List<Highscore> limitHighscores(List<Highscore> highscores, Integer limit)

      highscores - the highscores to limit
      limit - the maximum number of highscores to retrieve

      the limited highscores
